casebody.data:
Evan J. HODGE, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
STATE of Indiana, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 45A03-1701-CR-111 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED November 30, 2017
